title: Sgt Pepper's Musical Revolution with Howard Goodall
actors: Howard Goodall, The Beatles, Paul McCartney, Ringo Starr
plot: With visually striking elements and never-heard-before recording session outtakes, award-winning composer and music historian Howard Goodall looks back at the creation and ongoing influence of "Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band".
name: Sgt Pepper's Musical Revolution with Howard Goodall
